actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to the order of Thursday, September 7, 2023,  the Journal of the proceedings of the Senate was deemed approved to date.
Pursuant to the order of Thursday, September 7, 2023, the morning hour being deemed expired, and the times for the recognition of the two leaders being reserved.
The following transactions of morning business occurred on today .

PN551:
        Tanya J. Bradsher, of Virginia, to be Deputy Secretary of Veterans Affairs

        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- Cloture invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 44. Record Vote Number: 223
By unanimous consent, on the request of Mr. Menendez, at 6:46 p.m., the Senate adjourned, under its order of today, until 10 a.m. tomorrow.
